title: Bike Bright
category: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google api, node
body:
Bike Bright was a collaborative effort between myself and three others over 2 weeks at Code Fellows. It is a single page web app that allows the user to get in touch with the Portland community to find up date bicycle parking and locations of bicycle theft.

The site utilizes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and Google api.

title: Discover Portland
body:
Discover Portland was my first collaborative project at Code Fellows. It allows the user to get updated information on activities to do in the area based on their lifestyle choices.

The site utilizes HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JSON

title: Donut Shop
body: Donut Shop was a simple JavaScript app that allows the user to dynamically adjust the necessary requirements needed for service for donut shops in the Portland area. The results are then displayed on a chart.

title: Musician Vote Tracker
body: The Musician Vote Tracker was a small JavaScript app to allow users to vote on their favorite bands and have the chart update dynamically. The results will persistently stay upon leaving the window.
